title: Ijiwaru Shujin No Mitsugi Ni Torokeru
alternative_title: My Mean Master Makes My Body Melt ; イジワル主人の蜜戯にとろける
status: My Mean Master Makes My Body Melt ; イジワル主人の蜜戯にとろける
description:
Description :
        A love story between a slightly obsessive young master and a former classmate who's now his maid.Kazuomi Kagami is the center of all the students at a super wealthy private school. For some reason, Kazuomi is attached to Yuito, a normal, average boy. Yuito finds himself becoming friends with Kazuomi, but they go their different ways after graduating high school.Yuito's father goes deep into debt and Kazuomi offers him a job to become his caretaker. Yuito reluctantly agrees to his proposition and ends up in a situation he was not expecting!So begins his days of teasing by his young master, Kazuomi. The hot and heavy spinoff of the hit series "Good Job, Young Master" featuring Eiji Kagami's older brother!
